des:
Brain Games is a world-first massively multiplayer voice activated games platform perfect for playing on your Echo Show or Fire TV. Pit your wits against other players around the world in real-time!

Will you be the Maths Master, or are you Magic at Anagrams… now’s the time to find out.

The Games:
Brain Games has four unique and fun games to choose from:
 - Maths Master – Given a goal number, and six random numbers, get as close to the goal as you can using the 4 basic operators: + - x %. Attempt to beat your opponent over three rounds of this challenging game.
 - Anagram Magic – Starting with nine random letters, try to make the longest word possible. Get a longer word than your opponent in each of the three rounds to win the game!
 - Speedy Sums – Answer as many quick-fire maths puzzles as you can in the time limit, answer more than your opponent before the clocks runs down to be crowned the winner!

Access any of these games from the main lobby. Say `help` at any point during the games if you do not know how to play, and you will be given instructions on what to do!

Avatars:
Brain Games also lets you create up to four avatars:
 - Four types to choose from (boy, girl, man, woman).
 - Millions of combinations to create.
 - Level up your avatars by playing any of the four games.
 - Unlock extra items for your avatar as you level up.

There are options for all the family, stand out from the crowd with your unique style!

⭐ Purchasable Options ⭐
Brain Games has a shop where you can purchase `Brain Bucks`, use these to build up your unique item packs to spice up your characters style. Brain Bucks can also be used to purchase new games that we will add to the shop. You can find all of this in the shop, which you can access from the main lobby. 

⭐Brain Games Premium⭐
Become a member of Brain Games Premium to have unlimited plays of all our Brain Games every day. 

*New Updates*
Base on recent feedback, we have made updates to improve your experience:
- Added more time to each round in every game.
- Made matchmaking more event, so other players will be a similar level to you.
- We now reveal the longest word at the end of every Anagram Magic round.
